2122.subject: SPED
2122.descrlong: This field experience course required for all candidates during their initial semester.  This field experience requirement, along with SPED 567B, provides practical field experience opportunities teaching students with mild/moderate or moderate/severe disabilities in k-12 public and non-public school settings.  Additionally, the course provides candidates with knowledge of typical and atypical human development.  Offered fall and spring.
